sentences.sContent: He was able to fool the world with his veneer of education.
sentences.sCn: 他能够通过对自己的教育背景加以虚饰来愚弄世人。

synos.tran: 外表；虚饰；[建]饰面；胶合板的一层；[木]薄木片

words.tran: 镶面；木板胶合；薄皮镶合

trans.tranCn: 薄板， 单板； 外表， 虚饰
trans.tranOther: a thin layer of wood or plastic that covers the surface of a piece of furniture made of cheaper material, to make it look better
